attributes.action: Help the homeless stay off the street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to help the homeless get more housing.There are over 700000 empty homes in the uk and alot of land aswell.For places to be built on like the YMCA for adult homeless people.sign this and start helping.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
